item.title: [Python] Chemistry in Python
item.description: #Introduction Last time, I analyzed data with Python after a long absence. I forgot how to use pandas. At that time, I had a sudden thought, “Speaking of which, I’ve never heard of anyone who has used Python in syncing our department.” I’m asking you how many R users are… (It’s natural that it’s easy and has many packages.) I will introduce that Python can also do chemistry. *Installation of package is omitted.
